Description of incident: "On July 28, 2016, we were advised by our third-party information technology provider that it had identified two unauthorized administrative accounts on a server in one of our branch offices.  We immediately began an investigation and promptly disabled the unauthorized accounts.Findings from our investigation show that the server may have contained information related to your mortgage application, including your name, address, driver's license number, date of birth, Social Security number, and financial account numbers."More Information: https://oag.ca.gov/ecrime/databreach/reports/sb24-64437
